name: Three Domain Disgust Questionnaire
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: A dataset containing responses to the Three Domain Disgust Questionnaire (Tybur et al.)

variableMeasured.name: id
variableMeasured.description: Each questionnaire completion's unique ID

variableMeasured.name: user_id
variableMeasured.description: Each participant's unique ID

variableMeasured.name: date
variableMeasured.description: Date of completion (YYY-mm-dd)

variableMeasured.name: moral1
variableMeasured.description: Shoplifting a candy bar from a convenience store

variableMeasured.name: moral2
variableMeasured.description: Stealing from a neighbor

variableMeasured.name: moral3
variableMeasured.description: A student cheating to get good grades

variableMeasured.name: moral4
variableMeasured.description: Deceiving a friend

variableMeasured.name: moral5
variableMeasured.description: Forging someone's signature on a legal document

variableMeasured.name: moral6
variableMeasured.description: Cutting to the front of a line to purchase the last few tickets to a show

variableMeasured.name: moral7
variableMeasured.description: Intentionally lying during a business transaction

variableMeasured.name: sexual1
variableMeasured.description: Hearing two strangers having sex

variableMeasured.name: sexual2
variableMeasured.description: Performing oral sex

variableMeasured.name: sexual3
variableMeasured.description: Watching a pornographic video

variableMeasured.name: sexual4
variableMeasured.description: Finding out that someone you don't like has sexual fantasies about you

variableMeasured.name: sexual5
variableMeasured.description: Bringing someone you just met back to your room to have sex

variableMeasured.name: sexual6
variableMeasured.description: A stranger of the opposite sex intentionally rubbing your thigh in an elevator

variableMeasured.name: sexual7
variableMeasured.description: Having anal sex with someone of the opposite sex

variableMeasured.name: pathogen1
variableMeasured.description: Stepping on dog poop

variableMeasured.name: pathogen2
variableMeasured.description: Sitting next to someone who has red sores on their arm

variableMeasured.name: pathogen3
variableMeasured.description: Shaking hands with a stranger who has sweaty palms

variableMeasured.name: pathogen4
variableMeasured.description: Seeing some mold on old leftovers in your refrigerator

variableMeasured.name: pathogen5
variableMeasured.description: Standing close to a person who has body odor

variableMeasured.name: pathogen6
variableMeasured.description: Seeing a cockroach run across the floor

variableMeasured.name: pathogen7
variableMeasured.description: Accidentally touching a person's bloody cut
